name: Collect And Collapse
description:
This game created for learning & practice purpose 

(TOPIC : 2D ,Runner-like game ,State Machine ,Stage Generator)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

W,D : Move The Fox

Space : Jump

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game Rules/Machanic

Cherry : 100 P

Diamond : 1000 P

Speed Increase every 10000 P

Touch monster and you Die!
